solution_line_template: An additional {additional_fraction_numerator}/{additional_fraction_denominator} of {initial_thread_length}cm is needed which is {initial_thread_length}cm*({additional_fraction_numerator}/{additional_fraction_denominator}) = <<{initial_thread_length}*({additional_fraction_numerator}/{additional_fraction_denominator})={additional_thread_length}>>{additional_thread_length}cm
